/usr/bin/c++    -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Wshadow -O2 -std=c++11   CMakeFiles/Glitter.dir/Glitter/Sources/ShaderProgram.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Glitter.dir/Glitter/Sources/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Glitter.dir/Glitter/Sources/Sphere.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Glitter.dir/Glitter/Vendor/glad/src/glad.c.o  -o Glitter/Glitter -rdynamic Glitter/Vendor/glfw/src/libglfw3.a -ldl -lrt -lm -ldl -lX11 -lpthread
